message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I know this product is worth $1000000 to you, and I'm confident it will generate significant returns. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1050000. This is a fair price that allows for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know your decision, as I have another interested party ready to purchase it if you decline.
